content: jokes rely on assumed power structures and hierarchy - Nish's joke is (implicitly) attacking the dominant power in UK society (white, male, privileged). If you flipped the roles and the targets, it becomes a white guy willing attacks on minorities which yes, is racist

photo.alt: Nish Kumar tweet: balancing out the fact that I can't stand Javid or Sunak with the fact that I love to see a rich white man brought down by Asians
Adam Brooks tweet: This Nish Kumar tweet wouldn't still be up if a white man tweeted the same about bringing down an Asian man. You know it, I know it.
